content: k3 row 5 *k to 4 sts before m yo k1 yo k3 sm k3 yo k1 yo* repeat * to * once k4 row 7 *k to 5 sts before m yo k1 yo k4 sm k4 yo k1 yo* repeat * to * once k5 row 9 *k to 6 sts before m yo k1 yo k5 sm k5 yo k1 yo* repeat * to * once k6 you should have 82 84 84 86 86 88 88 90 92 sts neckline increases row 1 k1 m1l *k to 2 sts before m yo k1 yo k1 sm k1 yo k1 yo* repeat * to * once k to 1 st before end m1r k1 row 2/4/6/8 p to end row 3 k1 m1l *k to 3 sts before m yo k1 yo k2 sm k2 yo k1 yo* repeat * to * once k to 1 st before end m1r k1 row 5 k1 m1l *k to 4 sts before m yo k1 yo k3 sm k3 yo k1 yo* repeat * to * once k to 1 st before end m1r k1 row 7 k1 m1l *k to 5 sts before m yo k1 yo k4 sm k4 yo k1 yo* repeat * to * once k to 1 st before end m1r k1 row 9 k1 m1l *k to 6 sts before m yo k1 yo k5 sm k5 yo k1 yo* repeat * to * once k to 1 st before end m1r k1 sizes 7 8 9 only row 10 p to end repeat row 1 to 9 once do not cut yarn you should have ended after a rs row row 9 you should have 132 134 134 136 136 138 188 190 192 sts wan cheng phua © copyright 2023 knittygrittysg com joining the neckline continuing from the previous section cast on 16 18 18 20 20 22 12 14 16 sts ensuring sts are not twisted place bor marker and join in the round k to end for one round you should have 148 152 152 156 156 160 200 204 208 sts shoulder increases sizes 1 2 only skip to yoke depth increases sizes 3 4 5 6 7 8 9 only round 1 *k to 2 sts before m yo k1 yo k1 sm k1 yo k1 yo* repeat * to * once k to end round 2/4/6/8/10 k to end round 3 *k to 3 sts before m yo k1 yo k2 sm k2 yo k1 yo* repeat * to * once k to end round 5 *k to 4 sts before m yo k1 yo k3 sm k3 yo k1 yo* repeat * to * once k to end round 7 *k to 5 sts before m yo k1 yo k4 sm k4 yo k1 yo* repeat * to * once k to end round 9 *k to 6 sts before m yo k1 yo k5 sm k5 yo k1 yo* repeat * to * once
